Adventure Guildsman:
Adventurers between level 40 and 54 can use the following Support Magic:
Berserker Spirit, level 1 - 300 points.
Might, level 2 - 300 points.
Shield, level 2 - 150 points.
Wind Walk, level 2 - 300 points.
Focus, level 2 - 650 points.
Magic Barrier, level 1 - 300 points.
Death Whisper, level 2 - 800 points.
Guidance, level 2 - 300 points.
Bless Shield, level 2 - 150 points.
Blessed Body, level 3 - 300 points.
Blessed Soul, level 3 - 300 points.
Haste, level 1 - 400 points.
Agility, level 2 - 300 points.
Vampiric Rage, level 2 - 300 points.
Empower, level 2 - 300 points.
Acumen, level 2 - 600 points.
